# {.tabset}

## Projects

```{r}
source("functions.R")

projects <- read_csv(projects_csv) %>% 
  filter(team_key == params$team_key) %>% 
  left_join(
    read_csv(teams_csv) %>% 
      select(team_key, team_htm),
    by = "team_key") %>% 
  mutate(
    Project = glue("<a href={project_htm}>{Title}</a>")) %>% 
  select(Area = area_name, Project)

datatable(projects, escape = F)  
```

## People

```{r, results='asis'}
people <- read_csv(people_csv) %>% 
  filter(team_key == params$team_key)

people %>% 
  select(Role = role, Name = name, Email = email) %>% 
  datatable()
```

## Representation

```{r, results='asis'}
source("functions.R")

team <- read_csv(teams_csv) %>% 
  filter(team_key == params$team_key)

team %>% 
  select(starts_with("n_")) %>% 
  pivot_longer(everything(), names_to = "Group", values_to="Count") %>% 
  mutate(
    Group = str_replace(Group, "n_","")) %>% 
  kable()
```
